incident_logs.description: An attempt to access the system with invalid credentials was detected.

response_actions.description: Generated an alert and notified the security team.
The account in question was temporarily locked to prevent further attempts.

incident_logs.outcome: Potential breach averted. No unauthorized access was granted.

follow_up_actions.description: Initiate a detailed investigation to determine the source of the attempt.

incident_logs.description: Antivirus software detected and quarantined a piece of malware.

response_actions.description: The infected file was quarantined to prevent spread.
A full system scan was initiated to check for further infections.

incident_logs.outcome: Malware was contained and no further infections were found.

follow_up_actions.description: Perform root cause analysis to understand the malware's entry point.
Apply necessary patches to prevent similar incidents.
